strings.string: Enter the full name of the show
Enter the number of the season (two digits, required)
How to be sure kodi will find tvshow xml
Store your season folder in the tvshows (scanned) root folder ex : /folder/tvshow/dinotrux Season 1'
Be sure files are well named, the episode number should be visible (ex dinotruxE02.mp4)
Please confirm generation, existing nfo files will be overwritten
The nfo files should have be created
Now you can update your video library
